name: Gravity (itch) (Alexx882, W3D3, Monomus, Xifiggam, Stilbrech3rin, GustavAT)
name_original: Gravity (itch) (Alexx882, W3D3, Monomus, Xifiggam, Stilbrech3rin, GustavAT)
description:
On a snowy day at Turacher Höhe...

...your world collapsed during the Hüttenjam.

Jump between two parallel universes by changing the gravity and collect urgently needed supplies 🍕. 

Developed for PICO-8 on the Hüttenjam 2023 at the Turracher Höhe.

Controls
  • X ... Toggle gravity
  • C ... Return to main menu (during menus)

Collect 🍕 for extra points.

Team
